engine

Class RandomMapCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.RandomMapCreator

  • public class RandomMapCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    RandomMapCreator is a class that represents a random matrix that represents a map
    Author:
    Peter

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int _cols 
      private int[][] _floorMap
      matrix that represents the location of diffrent floors

      private int[] _keys
      the indexes available
      first index is floor
      second index is middle floor
      third index is full
      wall forth index is half wall
      private java.util.Random _rand 
      private int _rows 
      private int[][] _spawn
      the spawn zone the randomization cannot override it.
      private int[][] _wallMap
      matrix that represents the location of diffrent walls , 0 if no wall
      private int[][] _wallModels
      wall directions used for better use of cpu , and overall better performance in order to understand - guider is the logical sequence that we can use inorder to use math to increase performance the first index represents the amount of neighbors the second index represents the index according to the logical guider
      private int[] _walls
      wall models according to indexes, [0] at first means no wall ( because we read the wallmap) the second index is an indestructible wall and the third index is half wall

      • _wallModels

        private int[][] _wallModels
         wall directions used for better use of cpu , and overall better performance in order to
 understand - guider is the logical sequence that we can use inorder to use math to increase
 performance the first index represents the amount of neighbors the second index represents
 the index according to the logical guider
        _wall3Models=//guider the wall that is missing clockwise .
        _wall2Models//guider will be the most clockwised wayexists, clockwise.
        _wall1Models//guider the wall that exists clockwise.

        Returns:

      • polishMap

        public int[][] polishMap(int[][] map)
        the function takes the raw drafted matrixes and converts them into walls with connection since there are 16 variations of wall directions it can become complicated if not explained properly use the template for understanding in srcImages/walls to understand the directions

      • sumAllWallNeighbor

        public int sumAllWallNeighbor(int i,
                              int j)
        the function sums the amount of neighbor walls in 4 direction to the current block if they are the same as current block.
        Parameters:
        i - - the row index of the current block
        j - - the col index of the current block
        Returns:
        the sum of all similar neighbors

      • getModelIndex

        public int getModelIndex(int i,
                         int j)
        the function uses complex stracture of indexes I have given in order to show some logical sequence and it returns the required index of the current block
        Parameters:
        i - - the row index of the current block
        j - - the col index of the current block
        Returns:
        the index according to the template that suits best for the block
